user.title: Connect to Eveus Charger
user.description: Enter your Eveus charger connection details.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the charger. Please verify the IP address and ensure the device is online.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid username or password. Please check your credentials and try again.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please check the Home Assistant logs.

abort.already_configured: This Eveus charger is already configured
